code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,LineElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(LineElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement);export default function CoinChart(_ref){let{sparkline}=_ref;const data={labels:sparkline.map((_,i)=>i),datasets:[{data:sparkline,fill:false,borderColor:'#ffa500',borderWidth:2,pointRadius:0}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:{scales:{x:{display:false},y:{display:false}},plugins:{legend:{display:false}}},height:60});}
